aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: I'm a forward-thinking People Analytics & Digital HR Specialist with a passion for combining data, technology, and strategic foresight to reshape the future of work. As a Ph.D. candidate in Futures Studies, I explore how tech trends impact labor, organizations, and talent ecosystems. With 4+ years of experience in HR analytics, digital transformation, and academic research, I bring a unique blend of business acumen and innovation mindset. Open to new challenges in tech-driven HR teams, especially in dynamic environments like Turkey.
